content: सार्वभौम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (मी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Relating to, consisting of, the whole earth, universal. --मः {@--1@} An emperor, a universal monarch; नाज्ञाभंगं सहंते नृवर नृपतयस्त्वादृशाः सार्वभौमाः <ls>Mu. 3. 22.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the elephant presiding over the north, the quarter of Kubera.
